Description:
Detects commandline operations on shell history files

Author: Mikhail Larin, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious History File Operations
Query: sourcetype="macos-*" (command="*.bash_history*" OR command="*.zsh_history*" OR command="*.zhistory*" OR command="*.history*" OR command="*.sh_history*" OR command="*fish_history*")
